name: Extreme Encounters: Weather and Terrain: Water
name_original: Extreme Encounters: Weather and Terrain: Water
description:
Create Water Monster Lairs in Minutes!

Enjoy quick, easy templates to spice up encounters, travel, and especially boss fights with aquatic creatures, fey, hags, merfolk, and water elementals, as well as for staging battles in coastal areas, flood zones, fog, lakes, rivers, and oceans.

In this extreme template pack, you get environment rules as well as new monsters and treasure ideas for:

  • Fog of War (magical terrain)
  • Beach (Rocks or Sand) (nonmagical terrain)
  • Flood (nonmagical terrain)
  • Rain (Light or Heavy) (nonmagical weather)
  • Rapids (nonmagical terrain)
  • River Crossing or Ferry (nonmagical terrain)
  • Rough Sea Voyage (nonmagical weather)
  • Sand Dunes (Coastal) (nonmagical terrain)
  • Waterfall (nonmagical terrain)

We also give you options to increase the threat level of our magical terrains, right down to granting hostile creatures in them limited spell lists and/or other fun terrain-themed abilities!

This 5th Edition (5e) handbook is perfect for GMs who want to add epic fun and variety to your Fifth Edition game.

To use this 5e supplement, you also need a copy of the PHB, DMG, and MM from the world's greatest roleplaying game.
